/usr/local/cuda-11.2/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/teste.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/teste.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
